title: Bug 7752: Exporting multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the "Export" dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip)
4. Begin export to zip file

Observed Behavior:
An error message box pops up stating "Problems were encountered during export". The detail section of the error message lists the file with the same name in project 2 as the problem.

Expected Behavior:
The files with the same name in different directories should be exported to the zip file without any issues.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the software
2. Create two different projects
3. Add files with the same name to both projects, placing them in different directories
4. Open the "Export" dialog window
5. Select both projects
6. Provide a name for the zip file
7. Initiate the export process to the zip file
